[TABLE=width: 720]

<tbody>[TR]

[TD]Venturer Multi-Rover Spacecraft[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD][/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]This craft will handily transport four unmanned rovers to most of the Kerbolar System (haven't tried Moho yet, nor Eve, but Eve should be piece of cake).[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Requires 5 mods:

[TABLE=width: 720]

<tbody>[TR]

[TD]Carts[/TD]

[TD]

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-34-Cruise-Control-Compatibility-and-More

[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Damned Robotics[/TD]

[TD=align: right]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9675-v0-16-Damned-Robotics-Version-1-2-1[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Fixed Camera[/TD]

[TD=align: right]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12329-0-17-Multiversal-Mechatronics-Fixed-Camera-1-2[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]MechJeb[/TD]

[TD=align: right]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12384-PLUGIN-PART-0-17-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v1-9-3[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]um3kCorp Multifunction Utility Panels[/TD]

[TD=align: right]http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=41[/TD]

[/TR]

</tbody>[/TABLE][/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]

[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/D9yJh/embed"></iframe>

[/TD]

</tbody>[/TABLE]

Edited September 27, 2012 by um3k
Great ship. Question is how do you land with only rcs thrusters?

Enable RCS, orient to retrograde, and press "H" until your orbit intersects the planet. Then, land as you normally would, using H in place of throttle. It may take a bit of getting used to, but it gets the job done. I recommend not using Smart A.S.S. for the landing, as it is far too wasteful. Definitely use quicksave (F5) and quickload (F9) if you're not used to landing this way. If my capture software cooperates, I will attempt to make a demonstration video of the process. So far I've landed successfully on Kerbin, Mun, Minmus, and Duna.
